var deferLoadTime = 5000;
var readyForThirdPartyTrackingEvent = new CustomEvent('readyForThirdPartyTracking', { bubbles: true });
var readyForThirdPartyTracking = fnUtils.once(function() {
dataLayer.push({event: 'readyForThirdPartyTracking'});
window.dispatchEvent(readyForThirdPartyTrackingEvent);
});
var hasTargetingConsentHandler = function() {
const hasConsent = CMP.hasTargetingConsent();
if (hasConsent) {
readyForThirdPartyTracking();
}
return hasConsent;
};
var onRequiredDomEvent = fnUtils.once(function() {
if (!CMP) {
readyForThirdPartyTracking();
return;
}
if (!CMP.isLoading()) {
hasTargetingConsentHandler();
}
CMP.onConsentChange(hasTargetingConsentHandler);
});
[
['adRendered', onRequiredDomEvent],
['beforeunload', onRequiredDomEvent],
['load', function() { setTimeout(onRequiredDomEvent, deferLoadTime); }]
].forEach(function(event) {
win.addEventListener(event[0], event[1], { once: true });
});

<main class="comp dictionary-listing mntl-block" id="dictionary-listing_1-0">
<h1 class="comp article-heading mntl-text-block" id="article-heading_1-0">
Terms Beginning With 'A'</h1>
<div class="comp dictionary-top300-list mntl-block" id="dictionary-top300-list_1-0">
<div class="comp dictionary-top300-list__content mntl-block" id="dictionary-top300-list__content_1-0">
<div class="comp dictionary-top300-list__list-content mntl-block" id="dictionary-top300-list__list-content_1-0">
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/a/a-b-trust.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">A-B Trust</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/a/a-shares.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-1" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">A-Shares</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/a/aaa.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-2" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">AAA</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/a/aarp.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-3" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">AARP</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/a/abenomics.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-4" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Abenomics</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/a/ability-to-pay-taxation.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-5" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Ability-to-Pay Taxation</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/a/abnormalreturn.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-6" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Abnormal Return</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/a/absoluteadvantage.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-7" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Absolute Advantage</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/a/absolutereturn.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-8" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Absolute Return</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/a/absorptioncosting.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-9" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Absorption Costing</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/a/absorption-rate.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-10" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Absorption Rate</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/a/accelerateddepreciation.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-11" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Accelerated Depreciation</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/a/acceleration-clause.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-12" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Acceleration Clause</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/a/acceptable-quality-level-aql.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-13" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Acceptable Quality Level (AQL)</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/a/accepting-risk.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-14" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Accepting Risk</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/a/accidental-death-dismemberment-insurance.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-15" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Accidental Death and Dismemberment Insurance (AD&amp;D)</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/a/accidental-death-benefit.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-16" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Accidental Death Benefits</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/a/accountbalance.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-17" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Account Balance</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/a/account-in-trust.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-18" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Account in Trust</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/a/account-number.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-19" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Account Number</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/a/account-statement.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-20" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Account Statement</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/a/accountability.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-21" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Accountability</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/a/accountant.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-22" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Accountant</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/a/accountant-responsibility.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-23" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Accountant Responsibility</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/a/accounting.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-24" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Accounting</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/a/accounting-conservatism.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-25" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Accounting Conservatism</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/a/accounting-cycle.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-26" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Accounting Cycle</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/a/accounting-equation.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-27" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Accounting Equation</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/a/accounting-information-system-ais.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-28" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Accounting Information System (AIS)</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/a/accountingmethod.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-29" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Accounting Method</span></a>

<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/a/averagecostmethod.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-288" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Average Cost Method</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/a/averagedailybalance.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-289" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Average Daily Balance Method</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/a/average-daily-rate.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-290" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Average Daily Rate (ADR)</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/a/averagedailytradingvolume.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-291" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Average Daily Trading Volume (ADTV)</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/a/adx.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-292" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Average Directional Index (ADX)</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/a/averagelife.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-293" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Average Life</span></a>

if(options.type.toUpperCase() == 'POST') {
if(options.contentType.indexOf("application/x-www-form-urlencoded") > -1) {
if (typeof originalOptions.data === 'string') {
if (originalOptions.data.length) {
originalOptions.data += "&";
}
originalOptions.data += "CSRFToken=19ca404b5b4d43db590f3fd10616db1a";

} else {

}
}
if (options.contentType.indexOf("application/json") > -1) {
if (typeof originalOptions.data === 'string') {
originalOptions.data = JSON.parse(originalOptions.data);
}
options.data = JSON.stringify($.extend(originalOptions.data, { "CSRFToken": "19ca404b5b4d43db590f3fd10616db1a" }));
}
}

<main class="comp dictionary-listing mntl-block" id="dictionary-listing_1-0">
<h1 class="comp article-heading mntl-text-block" id="article-heading_1-0">
Terms Beginning With 'B'</h1>
<div class="comp dictionary-top300-list mntl-block" id="dictionary-top300-list_1-0">
<div class="comp dictionary-top300-list__content mntl-block" id="dictionary-top300-list__content_1-0">
<div class="comp dictionary-top300-list__list-content mntl-block" id="dictionary-top300-list__list-content_1-0">
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/b/babybond.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Baby Bond</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/b/baby_boomer.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-1" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Baby Boomer</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/b/back-endratio.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-2" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Back-End Ratio</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/b/backoffice.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-3" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Back Office</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/b/backstop.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-4" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Back Stop</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/b/back-to-back-letters-of-credit.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-5" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Back-to-Back Letters of Credit</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/b/backdoor-roth-ira.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-6" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Backdoor Roth IRA</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/b/backflush-costing.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-7" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Backflush Costing</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/b/backlog.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-8" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Backlog</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/b/backorder.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-9" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Backorder</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/b/backtesting.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-10" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Backtesting</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/b/backupwithholding.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-11" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Backup Withholding</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/b/backwardintegration.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-12" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Backward Integration</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/b/backwardation.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-13" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Backwardation</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/b/bad-credit.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-14" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Bad Credit</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/b/baddebt.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-15" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Bad Debt</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/b/bad-debt-expense.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-16" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Bad Debt Expense</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/b/bag-holder.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-17" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Bag Holder</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/b/bail-bond.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-18" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Bail Bond</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/b/bailin.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-19" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Bail-In</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/b/bailout.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-20" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Bailout</span></a>

};

if(options.type.toUpperCase() == 'POST') {
if(options.contentType.indexOf("application/x-www-form-urlencoded") > -1) {
if (typeof originalOptions.data === 'string') {
if (originalOptions.data.length) {
originalOptions.data += "&";
}
originalOptions.data += "CSRFToken=90c5292ee294e9f4929831269c3c6d93";
options.data = originalOptions.data;
} else {
options.data = $.param(($.extend(originalOptions.data, { "CSRFToken": "90c5292ee294e9f4929831269c3c6d93" })), true);
}
}
if (options.contentType.indexOf("application/json") > -1) {
if (typeof originalOptions.data === 'string') {
originalOptions.data = JSON.parse(originalOptions.data);
}
options.data = JSON.stringify($.extend(originalOptions.data, { "CSRFToken": "90c5292ee294e9f4929831269c3c6d93" }));
}
}

<main class="comp dictionary-listing mntl-block" id="dictionary-listing_1-0">
<h1 class="comp article-heading mntl-text-block" id="article-heading_1-0">
Terms Beginning With 'C'</h1>
<div class="comp dictionary-top300-list mntl-block" id="dictionary-top300-list_1-0">
<div class="comp dictionary-top300-list__content mntl-block" id="dictionary-top300-list__content_1-0">
<div class="comp dictionary-top300-list__list-content mntl-block" id="dictionary-top300-list__list-content_1-0">
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/c/c-corporation.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">C Corporation</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/c/c-suite.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-1" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">C-Suite</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/c/call.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-2" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Call</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/c/calloption.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-3" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Call Option</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/c/callablebond.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-4" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Callable Bond</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/c/canceled-check.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-5" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Canceled Check</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/c/candlestick.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-6" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Candlestick</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/c/cap-and-trade.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-7" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Cap and Trade</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/c/capacityutilizationrate.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-8" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Capacity Utilization Rate</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/c/cape-ratio.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-9" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">CAPE Ratio</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/c/capital.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-10" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Capital</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/c/capitalaccount.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-11" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Capital Account</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/c/capitaladequacyratio.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-12" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Capital Adequacy Ratio (CAR)</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/c/capitalasset.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-13" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Capital Asset</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/c/capm.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-14" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Capital Asset Pricing Model (CAPM)</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/c/capitalbudgeting.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-15" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Capital Budgeting</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/c/capitalemployed.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-16" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Capital Employed</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/c/capitalexpenditure.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-17" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Capital Expenditure</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/c/capitalgain.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-18" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Capital Gain</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/c/capital_gains_tax.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-19" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Capital Gains Tax</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/c/capitalgoods.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-20" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Capital Goods</span></a>

if(options.type.toUpperCase() == 'POST') {
if(options.contentType.indexOf("application/x-www-form-urlencoded") > -1) {
if (typeof originalOptions.data === 'string') {
if (originalOptions.data.length) {
originalOptions.data += "&";
}
originalOptions.data += "CSRFToken=a93916e04dcdc647cbb0584341e22e3c";

} else {

}
}

if (typeof originalOptions.data === 'string') {
originalOptions.data = JSON.parse(originalOptions.data);
}
options.data = JSON.stringify($.extend(originalOptions.data, { "CSRFToken": "a93916e04dcdc647cbb0584341e22e3c" }));
}
}

<h1 class="comp article-heading mntl-text-block" id="article-heading_1-0">
Terms Beginning With 'D'</h1>
<div class="comp dictionary-top300-list mntl-block" id="dictionary-top300-list_1-0">
<div class="comp dictionary-top300-list__content mntl-block" id="dictionary-top300-list__content_1-0">
<div class="comp dictionary-top300-list__list-content mntl-block" id="dictionary-top300-list__list-content_1-0">
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/d/dagmar.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">DAGMAR</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/d/darkcloud.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-1" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Dark Cloud Cover</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/d/dark-pool.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-2" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Dark Pool</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/d/dark-web.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-3" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Dark Web</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/d/darvasboxtheory.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-4" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Darvas Box Theory</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/d/data-analytics.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-5" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Data Analytics</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/d/datamining.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-6" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Data Mining</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/d/data-smoothing.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-7" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Data Smoothing</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/d/data-warehousing.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-8" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Data Warehousing</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/d/dunsnumber.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-9" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Data Universal Numbering System (DUNS) Number</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/d/david-ricardo.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-10" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">David Ricardo</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/d/david-tepper.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-11" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Who Is David Tepper? </span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/d/dax.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-12" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">What Is the DAX Stock Index?</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/d/daycount.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-13" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Day-Count Convention</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/d/dayorder.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-14" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Day Order</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/d/daytrader.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-15" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Day Trader</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/d/dpo.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-16" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Days Payable Outstanding</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/d/days-sales-inventory-dsi.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-17" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Days Sales of Inventory (DSI)</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/d/dso.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-18" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Days Sales Outstanding</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/d/days-working-capital.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-19" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Days Working Capital</span></a>

return 'c0083ff5fbe6a3892704a121d88b376a';
};
$.ajaxPrefilter((options, originalOptions) => {
if(options.type.toUpperCase() == 'POST') {
if(options.contentType.indexOf("application/x-www-form-urlencoded") > -1) {
if (typeof originalOptions.data === 'string') {
if (originalOptions.data.length) {
originalOptions.data += "&";
}
originalOptions.data += "CSRFToken=c0083ff5fbe6a3892704a121d88b376a";
options.data = originalOptions.data;
} else {
options.data = $.param(($.extend(originalOptions.data, { "CSRFToken": "c0083ff5fbe6a3892704a121d88b376a" })), true);
}
}
if (options.contentType.indexOf("application/json") > -1) {
if (typeof originalOptions.data === 'string') {
originalOptions.data = JSON.parse(originalOptions.data);
}
options.data = JSON.stringify($.extend(originalOptions.data, { "CSRFToken": "c0083ff5fbe6a3892704a121d88b376a" }));
}
}

<main class="comp dictionary-listing mntl-block" id="dictionary-listing_1-0">
<h1 class="comp article-heading mntl-text-block" id="article-heading_1-0">
Terms Beginning With 'E'</h1>
<div class="comp dictionary-top300-list mntl-block" id="dictionary-top300-list_1-0">
<div class="comp dictionary-top300-list__content mntl-block" id="dictionary-top300-list__content_1-0">
<div class="comp dictionary-top300-list__list-content mntl-block" id="dictionary-top300-list__list-content_1-0">
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/e/emini.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">E-Mini</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/e/eafe_index.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-1" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">EAFE Index</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/e/early-adopter.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-2" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Early Adopter</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/e/earlyexercise.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-3" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Early Exercise</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/e/earmarking.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-4" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Earmarking</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/e/earnedincome.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-5" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Earned Income</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/e/earnedincomecredit.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-6" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Earned Income Credit (EITC)</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/e/earnedpremium.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-7" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Earned Premium</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/e/earnest-money.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-8" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Earnest Money</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/e/earnings.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-9" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Earnings</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/e/earnings-announcement.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-10" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Earnings Announcement</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/e/ebiat.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-11" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Earnings Before Interest After Taxes (EBIAT)</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/e/ebit.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-12" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Earnings Before Interest and Taxes (EBIT)</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/e/ebida.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-13" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Earnings Before Interest, Depreciation and Amortization (EBIDA)</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/e/ebitda.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-14" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Earnings Before Interest, Taxes, Depreciation and Amortization (EBITDA)</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/e/ebt.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-15" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Earned Income Credit (EIC)</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/e/earnings-call.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-16" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Earnings Call</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/e/ecr.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-17" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Earnings Credit Rate (ECR)</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/e/earningsestimate.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-18" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Earnings Estimate</span></a>

<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/e/expirationdate.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-278" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Expiration Date (Derivatives)</span></a>

if(options.contentType.indexOf("application/x-www-form-urlencoded") > -1) {

if (originalOptions.data.length) {
originalOptions.data += "&";
}

}

if (typeof originalOptions.data === 'string') {

}

}

<main class="comp dictionary-listing mntl-block" id="dictionary-listing_1-0">
<h1 class="comp article-heading mntl-text-block" id="article-heading_1-0">
Terms Beginning With 'F'</h1>
<div class="comp dictionary-top300-list mntl-block" id="dictionary-top300-list_1-0">
<div class="comp dictionary-top300-list__content mntl-block" id="dictionary-top300-list__content_1-0">
<div class="comp dictionary-top300-list__list-content mntl-block" id="dictionary-top300-list__list-content_1-0">
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/f/1913-federal-reserve-act.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">1913 Federal Reserve Act</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/f/faang-stocks.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-1" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">FAANG Stocks</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/f/facevalue.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-2" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Face Value</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/f/facility.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-3" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Facility</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/f/factor.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-4" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Factor</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/f/factor-investing.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-5" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Factor Investing</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/f/factor-market.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-6" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Factor Market</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/f/factors-production.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-7" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Factors of Production</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/f/factset.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-8" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">FactSet</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/f/facultative-reinsurance.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-9" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Facultative Reinsurance</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/f/failuretodeliver.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-10" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Fail</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/f/fair-credit-billing-act-fcba.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-11" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Fair Credit Billing Act (FCBA)</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/f/fair-credit-reporting-act-fcra.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-12" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Fair Credit Reporting Act (FCRA)</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/f/fair-debt-collection-practices-act-fdcpa.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-13" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Fair Debt Collection Practices Act (FDCPA)</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/f/fair-labor-standards-act-flsa.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-14" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Fair Labor Standards Act</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/f/fairmarketvalue.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-15" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Fair Market Value (FMV)</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/f/fairvalue.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-16" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Fair Value</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/f/fallenangel.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-17" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Fallen Angel</span></a>

<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/f/fullydilutedshares.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-278" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Fully Diluted Shares</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/f/fully-vested.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-279" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Fully Vested</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/f/functional-currency.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-280" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Functional Currency</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/f/functional-obsolescence.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-281" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Functional Obsolescence</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/f/fund.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-282" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Fund</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/f/fund-flow.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-283" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Fund Flow</span></a>

<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/f/fundsoffunds.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-285" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Fund of Funds (FOF)</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/f/fundamentalanalysis.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-286" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Fundamental Analysis</span></a>

<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/f/fundeddebt.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-288" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Funded Debt</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/f/fundsfromoperation.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-289" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Funds From Operations (FFO)</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/f/ftp.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-290" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Funds Transfer Pricing (FTP)</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/f/fungibility.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-291" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Fungibility</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/f/ffe.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-292" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Furniture, Fixtures, and Equipment (FF&amp;E)</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/f/futurevalue.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-293" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Future Value (FV)</span></a>

}

<main class="comp dictionary-listing mntl-block" id="dictionary-listing_1-0">
<h1 class="comp article-heading mntl-text-block" id="article-heading_1-0">
Terms Beginning With 'G'</h1>
<div class="comp dictionary-top300-list mntl-block" id="dictionary-top300-list_1-0">
<div class="comp dictionary-top300-list__content mntl-block" id="dictionary-top300-list__content_1-0">

if(options.contentType.indexOf("application/x-www-form-urlencoded") > -1) {
if (typeof originalOptions.data === 'string') {
if (originalOptions.data.length) {
originalOptions.data += "&";
}

options.data = originalOptions.data;
} else {
options.data = $.param(($.extend(originalOptions.data, { "CSRFToken": "64823a318d37d6c09315bc0808a2bf63" })), true);
}
}
if (options.contentType.indexOf("application/json") > -1) {
if (typeof originalOptions.data === 'string') {
originalOptions.data = JSON.parse(originalOptions.data);
}

}
}

}

return hasConsent;

window.Mntl.csrf = function() {
return 'd0b8c9656de959f8f729c69eed4784ee';
};
$.ajaxPrefilter((options, originalOptions) => {
if(options.type.toUpperCase() == 'POST') {
if(options.contentType.indexOf("application/x-www-form-urlencoded") > -1) {
if (typeof originalOptions.data === 'string') {
if (originalOptions.data.length) {
originalOptions.data += "&";
}
originalOptions.data += "CSRFToken=d0b8c9656de959f8f729c69eed4784ee";
options.data = originalOptions.data;
} else {
options.data = $.param(($.extend(originalOptions.data, { "CSRFToken": "d0b8c9656de959f8f729c69eed4784ee" })), true);
}
}
if (options.contentType.indexOf("application/json") > -1) {
if (typeof originalOptions.data === 'string') {
originalOptions.data = JSON.parse(originalOptions.data);
}
options.data = JSON.stringify($.extend(originalOptions.data, { "CSRFToken": "d0b8c9656de959f8f729c69eed4784ee" }));
}
}
});window.Mntl.affiliateLinkRewriter.setMappings( {

<h1 class="comp article-heading mntl-text-block" id="article-heading_1-0">

<div class="comp dictionary-top300-list__content mntl-block" id="dictionary-top300-list__content_1-0">

if(options.contentType.indexOf("application/x-www-form-urlencoded") > -1) {
if (typeof originalOptions.data === 'string') {
if (originalOptions.data.length) {
originalOptions.data += "&";
}

} else {

}
}

if (typeof originalOptions.data === 'string') {
originalOptions.data = JSON.parse(originalOptions.data);
}
options.data = JSON.stringify($.extend(originalOptions.data, { "CSRFToken": "51413b1f6dac1e6b872c073961e00af0" }));
}

window.Mntl.csrf = function() {
return '3897dcb6cc58a092b58dc405c3e59377';
};
$.ajaxPrefilter((options, originalOptions) => {
if(options.type.toUpperCase() == 'POST') {
if(options.contentType.indexOf("application/x-www-form-urlencoded") > -1) {
if (typeof originalOptions.data === 'string') {
if (originalOptions.data.length) {
originalOptions.data += "&";
}
originalOptions.data += "CSRFToken=3897dcb6cc58a092b58dc405c3e59377";
options.data = originalOptions.data;
} else {
options.data = $.param(($.extend(originalOptions.data, { "CSRFToken": "3897dcb6cc58a092b58dc405c3e59377" })), true);
}
}
if (options.contentType.indexOf("application/json") > -1) {
if (typeof originalOptions.data === 'string') {
originalOptions.data = JSON.parse(originalOptions.data);
}
options.data = JSON.stringify($.extend(originalOptions.data, { "CSRFToken": "3897dcb6cc58a092b58dc405c3e59377" }));
}
}

<h1 class="comp article-heading mntl-text-block" id="article-heading_1-0">
Terms Beginning With 'L'</h1>
<div class="comp dictionary-top300-list mntl-block" id="dictionary-top300-list_1-0">
<div class="comp dictionary-top300-list__content mntl-block" id="dictionary-top300-list__content_1-0">
<div class="comp dictionary-top300-list__list-content mntl-block" id="dictionary-top300-list__list-content_1-0">
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/l/l-share-annuity-class.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">L Share Annuity Class</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/l/laborintensive.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-1" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Labor Intensive</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/l/labor-market.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-2" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Labor Market</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/l/labor-market-flexibility.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-3" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Labor Market Flexibility</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/l/labor-productivity.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-4" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Labor Productivity</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/l/labor-theory-of-value.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-5" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Labor Theory Of Value (LTV)</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/l/labor-union.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-6" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Labor Union</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/l/laddering.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-7" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Laddering</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/l/laffercurve.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-8" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Laffer Curve</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/l/laggard.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-9" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Laggard</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/l/laggingindicator.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-10" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Lagging Indicator</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/l/laissezfaire.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-11" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Laissez-Faire</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/l/lambda.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-12" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Lambda</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/l/lancaster-university-management-school.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-13" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Lancaster University Management School (LUMS)</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/l/land.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-14" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Land</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/l/land_contract.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-15" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Land Contract</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/l/land-trust.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-16" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Land Trust</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/l/landvalue.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-17" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Land Value</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/l/land-value-tax.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-18" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Land Value Tax (LVT)</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/l/landlocked.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-19" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Landlocked</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/l/landlord.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-20" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Landlord</span></a>

if(options.type.toUpperCase() == 'POST') {
if(options.contentType.indexOf("application/x-www-form-urlencoded") > -1) {
if (typeof originalOptions.data === 'string') {
if (originalOptions.data.length) {
originalOptions.data += "&";
}
originalOptions.data += "CSRFToken=8b5b2fb07f4aefab7631b14ea5d06a2c";

} else {
options.data = $.param(($.extend(originalOptions.data, { "CSRFToken": "8b5b2fb07f4aefab7631b14ea5d06a2c" })), true);
}
}
if (options.contentType.indexOf("application/json") > -1) {
if (typeof originalOptions.data === 'string') {
originalOptions.data = JSON.parse(originalOptions.data);
}
options.data = JSON.stringify($.extend(originalOptions.data, { "CSRFToken": "8b5b2fb07f4aefab7631b14ea5d06a2c" }));
}
}

<h1 class="comp article-heading mntl-text-block" id="article-heading_1-0">
Terms Beginning With 'M'</h1>
<div class="comp dictionary-top300-list mntl-block" id="dictionary-top300-list_1-0">
<div class="comp dictionary-top300-list__content mntl-block" id="dictionary-top300-list__content_1-0">
<div class="comp dictionary-top300-list__list-content mntl-block" id="dictionary-top300-list__list-content_1-0">
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/m/m1.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">M1</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/m/m2.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-1" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">M2</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/m/m3.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-2" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">M3</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/m/mpesa.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-3" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">M-Pesa</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/m/maastricht-treaty.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-4" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">What Is the Maastricht Treaty?</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/m/macaulayduration.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-5" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Macaulay Duration</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/m/macro-environment.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-6" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Macro Environment</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/m/macro-manager.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-7" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Macro Manager</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/m/macroeconomic-factor.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-8" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Macroeconomic Factor</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/m/macroeconomics.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-9" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Macroeconomics</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/m/magic-formula-investing.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-10" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Magic Formula Investing</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/m/magna-cum-laude.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-11" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Magna Cum Laude</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/m/magnetic-ink-character-recognition-line-micr.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-12" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">What Is the Magnetic Ink Character Recognition (MICR) Line on a Check?</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/m/mainstreet.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-13" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Main Street</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/m/maintenance-expenses.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-14" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Maintenance Expenses</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/m/maintenancemargin.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-15" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Maintenance Margin</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/m/majorityshareholder.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-16" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Majority Shareholder</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/m/make-or-buy-decision.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-17" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Make-or-Buy Decision</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/m/make-to-order.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-18" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Make to Order (MTO)</span></a>

<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/m/multilateral_development_bank.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-279" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Multilateral Development Bank (MDB)</span></a>

<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/m/multilateral_trading_facility.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-281" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Multilateral Trading Facility (MTF) </span></a>

return '7742c6302c489ff4db7bcd044dd945f8';
};
$.ajaxPrefilter((options, originalOptions) => {
if(options.type.toUpperCase() == 'POST') {
if(options.contentType.indexOf("application/x-www-form-urlencoded") > -1) {
if (typeof originalOptions.data === 'string') {
if (originalOptions.data.length) {
originalOptions.data += "&";
}
originalOptions.data += "CSRFToken=7742c6302c489ff4db7bcd044dd945f8";
options.data = originalOptions.data;
} else {
options.data = $.param(($.extend(originalOptions.data, { "CSRFToken": "7742c6302c489ff4db7bcd044dd945f8" })), true);
}
}
if (options.contentType.indexOf("application/json") > -1) {
if (typeof originalOptions.data === 'string') {
originalOptions.data = JSON.parse(originalOptions.data);
}
options.data = JSON.stringify($.extend(originalOptions.data, { "CSRFToken": "7742c6302c489ff4db7bcd044dd945f8" }));
}
}

<main class="comp dictionary-listing mntl-block" id="dictionary-listing_1-0">
<h1 class="comp article-heading mntl-text-block" id="article-heading_1-0">

if (typeof originalOptions.data === 'string') {

}

}

<h1 class="comp article-heading mntl-text-block" id="article-heading_1-0">

if (originalOptions.data.length) {
originalOptions.data += "&";
}

}
}

if (typeof originalOptions.data === 'string') {
originalOptions.data = JSON.parse(originalOptions.data);
}

}

<h1 class="comp article-heading mntl-text-block" id="article-heading_1-0">
Terms Beginning With 'P'</h1>
<div class="comp dictionary-top300-list mntl-block" id="dictionary-top300-list_1-0">
<div class="comp dictionary-top300-list__content mntl-block" id="dictionary-top300-list__content_1-0">
<div class="comp dictionary-top300-list__list-content mntl-block" id="dictionary-top300-list__list-content_1-0">
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/p/p-value.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">P-Test</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/p/p-value.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-1" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">P-Value</span></a>

<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/p/paga.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-3" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Paga</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/p/paidincapital.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-4" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Paid-In Capital</span></a>

<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/p/paidupcapital.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-6" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Paid-Up Capital</span></a>

<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/p/parvalue.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-11" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Par Value</span></a>

<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/p/parabolicindicator.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-13" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Parabolic SAR (Stop and Reverse) Indicator</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/p/paradox-of-thrift.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-14" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Paradox of Thrift</span></a>

window.Mntl.csrf = function() {
return 'afd4bff8b3c4fb4185a95a089cd2d1d2';
};
$.ajaxPrefilter((options, originalOptions) => {
if(options.type.toUpperCase() == 'POST') {
if(options.contentType.indexOf("application/x-www-form-urlencoded") > -1) {
if (typeof originalOptions.data === 'string') {
if (originalOptions.data.length) {
originalOptions.data += "&";
}
originalOptions.data += "CSRFToken=afd4bff8b3c4fb4185a95a089cd2d1d2";
options.data = originalOptions.data;
} else {
options.data = $.param(($.extend(originalOptions.data, { "CSRFToken": "afd4bff8b3c4fb4185a95a089cd2d1d2" })), true);
}
}
if (options.contentType.indexOf("application/json") > -1) {
if (typeof originalOptions.data === 'string') {
originalOptions.data = JSON.parse(originalOptions.data);
}
options.data = JSON.stringify($.extend(originalOptions.data, { "CSRFToken": "afd4bff8b3c4fb4185a95a089cd2d1d2" }));
}
}
});window.Mntl.affiliateLinkRewriter.setMappings( {

<h1 class="comp article-heading mntl-text-block" id="article-heading_1-0">
Terms Beginning With 'Q'</h1>
<div class="comp dictionary-top300-list mntl-block" id="dictionary-top300-list_1-0">
<div class="comp dictionary-top300-list__content mntl-block" id="dictionary-top300-list__content_1-0">
<div class="comp dictionary-top300-list__list-content mntl-block" id="dictionary-top300-list__list-content_1-0">
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/q/q.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Q</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/q/qratio.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-1" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Q Ratio (Tobin's Q)</span></a>

if(options.contentType.indexOf("application/x-www-form-urlencoded") > -1) {
if (typeof originalOptions.data === 'string') {
if (originalOptions.data.length) {
originalOptions.data += "&";
}

options.data = originalOptions.data;
} else {
options.data = $.param(($.extend(originalOptions.data, { "CSRFToken": "4b36ea7b417075657048bc2595272bd6" })), true);
}
}
if (options.contentType.indexOf("application/json") > -1) {
if (typeof originalOptions.data === 'string') {
originalOptions.data = JSON.parse(originalOptions.data);
}
options.data = JSON.stringify($.extend(originalOptions.data, { "CSRFToken": "4b36ea7b417075657048bc2595272bd6" }));
}
}

<h1 class="comp article-heading mntl-text-block" id="article-heading_1-0">

<div class="comp dictionary-top300-list__content mntl-block" id="dictionary-top300-list__content_1-0">

<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/r/r-squared.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">R-Squared</span></a>

return '513f4f57088691b79c7bcf4002218708';
};
$.ajaxPrefilter((options, originalOptions) => {
if(options.type.toUpperCase() == 'POST') {
if(options.contentType.indexOf("application/x-www-form-urlencoded") > -1) {
if (typeof originalOptions.data === 'string') {
if (originalOptions.data.length) {
originalOptions.data += "&";
}
originalOptions.data += "CSRFToken=513f4f57088691b79c7bcf4002218708";
options.data = originalOptions.data;
} else {
options.data = $.param(($.extend(originalOptions.data, { "CSRFToken": "513f4f57088691b79c7bcf4002218708" })), true);
}
}
if (options.contentType.indexOf("application/json") > -1) {
if (typeof originalOptions.data === 'string') {
originalOptions.data = JSON.parse(originalOptions.data);
}
options.data = JSON.stringify($.extend(originalOptions.data, { "CSRFToken": "513f4f57088691b79c7bcf4002218708" }));
}
}

<h1 class="comp article-heading mntl-text-block" id="article-heading_1-0">

<div class="comp dictionary-top300-list__content mntl-block" id="dictionary-top300-list__content_1-0">

if(options.contentType.indexOf("application/x-www-form-urlencoded") > -1) {
if (typeof originalOptions.data === 'string') {
if (originalOptions.data.length) {
originalOptions.data += "&";
}

} else {

}
}

if (typeof originalOptions.data === 'string') {
originalOptions.data = JSON.parse(originalOptions.data);
}

}
}

<h1 class="comp article-heading mntl-text-block" id="article-heading_1-0">
Terms Beginning With 'T'</h1>

<div class="comp dictionary-top300-list__content mntl-block" id="dictionary-top300-list__content_1-0">

if(options.contentType.indexOf("application/x-www-form-urlencoded") > -1) {
if (typeof originalOptions.data === 'string') {
if (originalOptions.data.length) {
originalOptions.data += "&";
}

} else {

}
}
if (options.contentType.indexOf("application/json") > -1) {
if (typeof originalOptions.data === 'string') {
originalOptions.data = JSON.parse(originalOptions.data);
}
options.data = JSON.stringify($.extend(originalOptions.data, { "CSRFToken": "7aca920e9f4833f5e4e66404b07e1e39" }));
}

return '9cd2313d6c7a464c97dc6909d769b834';
};
$.ajaxPrefilter((options, originalOptions) => {
if(options.type.toUpperCase() == 'POST') {
if(options.contentType.indexOf("application/x-www-form-urlencoded") > -1) {
if (typeof originalOptions.data === 'string') {
if (originalOptions.data.length) {
originalOptions.data += "&";
}
originalOptions.data += "CSRFToken=9cd2313d6c7a464c97dc6909d769b834";
options.data = originalOptions.data;
} else {
options.data = $.param(($.extend(originalOptions.data, { "CSRFToken": "9cd2313d6c7a464c97dc6909d769b834" })), true);
}
}
if (options.contentType.indexOf("application/json") > -1) {
if (typeof originalOptions.data === 'string') {
originalOptions.data = JSON.parse(originalOptions.data);
}
options.data = JSON.stringify($.extend(originalOptions.data, { "CSRFToken": "9cd2313d6c7a464c97dc6909d769b834" }));
}
}
});window.Mntl.affiliateLinkRewriter.setMappings( {

<h1 class="comp article-heading mntl-text-block" id="article-heading_1-0">

<div class="comp dictionary-top300-list__content mntl-block" id="dictionary-top300-list__content_1-0">

<h1 class="comp article-heading mntl-text-block" id="article-heading_1-0">
Terms Beginning With 'W'</h1>
<div class="comp dictionary-top300-list mntl-block" id="dictionary-top300-list_1-0">
<div class="comp dictionary-top300-list__content mntl-block" id="dictionary-top300-list__content_1-0">

<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/w/w2form.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">W-2 Form</span></a>

if(options.type.toUpperCase() == 'POST') {
if(options.contentType.indexOf("application/x-www-form-urlencoded") > -1) {
if (typeof originalOptions.data === 'string') {
if (originalOptions.data.length) {
originalOptions.data += "&";
}

options.data = originalOptions.data;
} else {

}
}
if (options.contentType.indexOf("application/json") > -1) {
if (typeof originalOptions.data === 'string') {
originalOptions.data = JSON.parse(originalOptions.data);
}
options.data = JSON.stringify($.extend(originalOptions.data, { "CSRFToken": "6fd45df34f80c1114e5f0056902cfa79" }));
}
}

<a class="terms-bar__link mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms-beginning-with-num-4769350" id="terms-bar__link_1-0" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">#</span></a>

<main class="comp dictionary-listing mntl-block" id="dictionary-listing_1-0">
<h1 class="comp article-heading mntl-text-block" id="article-heading_1-0">
Terms Beginning With 'X'</h1>
<div class="comp dictionary-top300-list mntl-block" id="dictionary-top300-list_1-0">
<div class="comp dictionary-top300-list__content mntl-block" id="dictionary-top300-list__content_1-0">
<div class="comp dictionary-top300-list__list-content mntl-block" id="dictionary-top300-list__list-content_1-0">
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/x/x-efficiency.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">X-Efficiency</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/x/x-mark-signature.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-1" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">X-Mark Signature</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/x/xbrl.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-2" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">XBRL (eXtensible Business Reporting Language)</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/x/xcd-eastern-caribbean-dollar.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-3" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">XCD (Eastern Caribbean Dollar)</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/x/xd.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-4" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">XD</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/x/xenocurrency.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-5" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Xenocurrency</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/x/xetra.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-6" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Xetra</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/business-essentials-4689832" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-7" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">XML (Extensible Markup Language)</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/x/xrt.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-8" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">XRT</span></a>
<div class="comp more-terms mntl-block" id="more-terms_1-0">
