<main class="comp dictionary-listing mntl-block" id="dictionary-listing_1-0">
<h1 class="comp article-heading mntl-text-block" id="article-heading_1-0">
Terms Beginning With 'Y'</h1>
<div class="comp dictionary-top300-list mntl-block" id="dictionary-top300-list_1-0">
<div class="comp dictionary-top300-list__content mntl-block" id="dictionary-top300-list__content_1-0">
<div class="comp dictionary-top300-list__list-content mntl-block" id="dictionary-top300-list__list-content_1-0">
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/y/y.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Y</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/y/y-share.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-1" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Y-Share</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/y/y2k.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-2" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Y2K</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/y/yacht-insurance.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-3" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Yacht Insurance</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/y/yale-school-of-management.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-4" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Yale School of Management</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/y/yankeebond.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-5" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Yankee Bond</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/y/yankeecd.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-6" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Yankee CD</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/y/yankeecd.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-7" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Yankee Certificate of Deposit</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/y/yankee-market.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-8" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Yankee Market</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/y/yard.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-9" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Yard</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/y/year-end-bonus.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-10" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Year-End Bonus</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/y/year-over-year.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-11" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Year-Over-Year (YOY)</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/y/ytd.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-12" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Year to Date (YTD)</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/y/yearly-probability-of-dying.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-13" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Yearly Probability of Dying</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/y/yearly-probability-of-living.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-14" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Yearly Probability of Living</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/y/yearly-rate-of-return-method.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-15" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Yearly Rate of Return Method</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/y/yearly-renewable-term-yrt.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-16" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Yearly Renewable Term (YRT)</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/y/yearly-renewable-term-plan-of-reinsurance.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-17" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Yearly Renewable Term Plan of Reinsurance</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/y/years-certain-annuity.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-18" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Years Certain Annuity</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/y/years-maximum-pensionable-earnings.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-19" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Year's Maximum Pensionable Earnings (YMPE)</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/y/yellowknight.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-20" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Yellow Knight</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/y/yellowsheets.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-21" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Yellow Sheets</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/y/yen-etf.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-22" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Yen ETF</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/y/yield.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-23" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Yield</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/y/yieldbasedoption.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-24" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Yield-Based Option</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/y/yield_basis.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-25" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Yield Basis</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/y/yieldcurve.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-26" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Yield Curve</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/y/yieldcurverisk.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-27" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Yield Curve Risk</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/y/yieldequivalence.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-28" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Yield Equivalence</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/y/yieldmaintenance.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-29" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Yield Maintenance</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/y/yield-on-cost.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-30" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Yield on Cost (YOC)</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/y/yield-earning-assets.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-31" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Yield on Earning Assets</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/y/yieldpickup.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-32" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Yield Pickup</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/y/yieldspread.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-33" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Yield Spread</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/y/yield_spread_premium.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-34" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Yield Spread Premium</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/y/yield_tilt_index_fund.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-35" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Yield Tilt Index Fund</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/y/yield-to-average-life.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-36" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Yield to Average Life</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/y/yieldtocall.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-37" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Yield to Call</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/y/yieldtomaturity.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-38" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Yield to Maturity (YTM)</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/y/yieldtoworst.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-39" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Yield to Worst (YTW)</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/y/yield-variance.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-40" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Yield Variance</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/y/yoyo.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-41" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Yo-Yo</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/y/york-antwerp-rules.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-42" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">York Antwerp Rules</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/budgeting-and-savings-4427755" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-43" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Young and Wealthy but Normal (YAWN)</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/y/yugen-kaisha.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-44" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Yugen Kaisha (YK)</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/y/yuppie.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-45" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Yuppie</span></a>

<h1 class="comp article-heading mntl-text-block" id="article-heading_1-0">
Terms Beginning With 'Z'</h1>
<div class="comp dictionary-top300-list mntl-block" id="dictionary-top300-list_1-0">
<div class="comp dictionary-top300-list__content mntl-block" id="dictionary-top300-list__content_1-0">
<div class="comp dictionary-top300-list__list-content mntl-block" id="dictionary-top300-list__list-content_1-0">
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/z/z.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Z</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/z/z-bond.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-1" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Z-Bond</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/z/zscore.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-2" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Z-Score</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/z/z-share.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-3" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Z-Share</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/z/z-test.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-4" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Z-Test</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/z/ztranche.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-5" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Z Tranche</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/z/zacks-investment-research.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-6" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Zacks Investment Research</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/z/zacks-lifecycle-indexes.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-7" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Zacks Lifecycle Indexes</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/z/zakat.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-8" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Zakat</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/z/zcash.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-9" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">ZCash</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/z/zba.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-10" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Zero Balance Account (ZBA)</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/z/zero-balance-card.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-11" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Zero Balance Card</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/z/zbb.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-12" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Zero-Based Budgeting (ZBB)</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/z/zebra.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-13" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Zero Basis Risk Swap (ZEBRA)</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/z/zero-betaportfolio.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-14" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Zero-Beta Portfolio</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/z/zero-bound.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-15" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Zero-Bound</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/z/zero-bound-interest-rate.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-16" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">What Is a Zero-Bound Interest Rate?</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/z/zero_capital_gains.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-17" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Zero Capital Gains Rate</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/z/zerocostcollar.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-18" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Zero Cost Collar</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/z/zero-cost-strategy.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-19" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Zero-Cost Strategy</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/z/zero-couponbond.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-20" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Zero-Coupon Bond</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/z/zero-coupon-cd.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-21" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Zero-Coupon Certificate Of Deposit (CD)</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/z/zero-couponconvertible.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-22" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Zero-Coupon Convertible</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/z/zero-coupon-inflation-swap.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-23" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Zero Coupon Inflation Swap</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/z/zero-coupon-mortgage.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-24" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Zero-Coupon Mortgage</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/z/zero-coupon-swap.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-25" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Zero Coupon Swap</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/z/zero-day-attack.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-26" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Zero Day Attack</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/z/zero-dividend-preferred-stock.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-27" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Zero-Dividend Preferred Stock</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/z/zero-floor-limit.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-28" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Zero-Floor Limit</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/z/zero-gap-condition.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-29" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Zero-Gap Condition</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/z/zero-investment-portfolio.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-30" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Zero-Investment Portfolio</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/z/zero-layoff-policy.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-31" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Zero Layoff Policy</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/z/zero-liability-policy.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-32" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Zero Liability Policy</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/z/zero-lot-line-house.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-33" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Zero-Lot-Line House</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/z/zero-one-integer-programming.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-34" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Zero-One Integer Programming</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/z/zero-percent.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-35" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Zero Percent</span></a>

<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/z/zero-rated-goods.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-38" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Zero-Rated Goods</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/z/zero-sumgame.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-39" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Zero-Sum Game</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/z/zero_uptick.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-40" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Zero Uptick</span></a>
<a class="dictionary-top300-list__list mntl-text-link" data-tracking-container="true" href="https://www.investopedia.com/terms/z/zspread.asp" id="dictionary-top300-list__list_1-0-41" rel="nocaes"><span class="link__wrapper">Zero-Volatility Spread (Z-spread)</span></a>

};

if(options.type.toUpperCase() == 'POST') {
if(options.contentType.indexOf("application/x-www-form-urlencoded") > -1) {
if (typeof originalOptions.data === 'string') {
if (originalOptions.data.length) {
originalOptions.data += "&";
}
originalOptions.data += "CSRFToken=1c20df59211c327458686c6613156645";
options.data = originalOptions.data;
} else {

}
}
if (options.contentType.indexOf("application/json") > -1) {
if (typeof originalOptions.data === 'string') {
originalOptions.data = JSON.parse(originalOptions.data);
}
options.data = JSON.stringify($.extend(originalOptions.data, { "CSRFToken": "1c20df59211c327458686c6613156645" }));
}
}
